titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer of certain real property to the General Services Administration and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4349-4350)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn without amendment. With written report No. 103-406.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 720.

bill.summary: 4/14/1994--Introduced. Authorizes Cook Inlet Region, Inc., to transfer to the United States the Wrangell Institute, in Wrangell, Alaska. Prescribes guidelines for the restoration of property credits.
